description: This is a product card component that displays product data like image, price, availability, variants, reviews, ratings and CTA buttons.

params.name:
{
  availabilityStatus,
  actionStatus,
  addedQuantity,
  maxAddQuantity,
  pureSoi,
  preorder,
  preorderInfo,
  quantityLabel,
  onAddToCart,
  onNotifyBackInStock,
  isAValidOffer,
  onCloseAddedToCartFlyout,
  onCloseNotifyFlyout,
  flyoutDirection,
  onQuantityChange
}

addedQuantity.description: The number of items have been added to cart

maxAddQuantity.description: The limit number of the items that could be added to cart

availabilityStatus.description: This is the AvailabilityStatus of the item.

pureSoi.description: If this product is a pure store only item.

preorder.description: If this product is avaialble for preorder

preorderInfo.description: The date it ships and tye type of preorder it is.

variantsUnselectedExperience.description: Is it variant selected or unselected experience

isAValidOffer.description:
A flag for if the product isAValidOffer. Generally used for variant combination
  to tell if a product is available for purchase.

components.description:
This component represents the call to action section of a product.
This component displays the quantity dropdown and the buttons like
Add To Cart, In-stock alert etc.
```jsx
<ProductCallToAction maxQuantity={12} url="/product/1531"/>
```

params.name:
{
  addedQuantity,
  maxAddQuantity,
  maxQuantity,
  url,
  pureSoi,
  preorder,
  preorderInfo,
  availabilityStatus,
  actionStatus,
  onAddToCart,
  onNotifyBackInStock,
  onCloseAddedToCartFlyout,
  onCloseNotifyFlyout,
  productCardIndex,
  onQuantityChange,
  isAValidOffer
}

productCardIndex.description: index of current product card in collection

averageRating.description: The current rating of the product

addedQuantity.description: The number of items have been added to cart

maxAddQuantity.description: The limit number of the items that could be added to cart

numberOfReviews.description: The number of reviews for this product

pureSoi.description: If this product is a pure store only item.

preorder.description: If this product is avaialble for preorder

preorderInfo.description: The date it ships and tye type of preorder it is.

flags.description: Price flags displayed on the image

isAValidOffer.description:
A flag for if the product isAValidOffer. Generally used for variant combination
  to tell if a product is available for purchase.

components.description:
This component displays product information in a card layout
```jsx
<ProductCard name="samsung tv" url="/ip/1531"
price={{price:40, currency:"$", savingsPrice:"$5", wasPrice:"$45"}}
maxQuantity={12} maxRating={5} averageRating={4} numberOfReviews={22}
flags={[{text: "Rollback", type: "rollback"}]}/>
```

playground.title: Card
playground.code:
<ProductCard name="samsung tv" url="/ip/1531"
price={{price:40, currency:"$", savingsPrice:"$5", wasPrice:"$45"}}
maxQuantity={12} maxRating={5} averageRating={4} numberOfReviews={22}
flags={[{text: "Rollback", type: "rollback"}]}/>

flags.description: Price flags displayed on the image

maxFlags.description: Maximum number of flags to render

isAValidOffer.description:
A flag for if the product isAValidOffer. Generally used for variant combination
   to tell if a product is available for purchase.

shouldRenderFlags.description: A flag to help remove flags rendering when it's necessary

isTileImage.description: A flag to determine if tile image should be used

components.description:
This component displays product image

```jsx
<ProductImage url="/ip/1531"
imageUrl="http://placehold.it/1000x1000"
flags={[{text: "Rollback", type: "rollback"}]}/>
```

properties.description: Additional properties object including URL and variants

flags.description: Price flags displayed on the image

offerShippingPassEligible.description: ShippingPassTile data if this is an overlay

title.description: Product title. Null to not show any title.

defaultValue.value:
{
  price: 0,
  savingsPrice: 0,
  listPrice: 0,
  wasPrice: 0,
  unitPrice: "",
  currency: ""
}

price.description: Price details for the product. Null to not show any price.

fromPrice.description: From price details for the product

preorder.description: If this product is avaialble for preorder

isAValidOffer.description:
A flag for if the product isAValidOffer. Generally used for variant combination
  to tell if a product is available for purchase.

overlay.description: True if this is an overlay

maxTitleLines.description: Maximum number of lines to allow for the product title. 0 for no truncation.

quantityLeft.description: Quantity left for a product. Will display if non-null.

submapFlyoutCheckout.description: True to use checkout submap flyout content. Otherwise will use cart version.

lowercasePriceText.description: To set all price text (was, list price, save, etc.) as lowercase

uid.description: Unique identifier for anchor tags used for analytics

dataAutomationId.description: Prefix to generate unique identifiers for automation tests

playground.title: Tile
playground.code:
<Tile
  title="Demo Product"
  flags={[{text: "Rollback", type: "rollback"}]}
  imageSrc="http://placehold.it/144x144"
  fromPrice={price:30, currency: "$", type: "from"}
  price={price:30, oldPrice: 40, currency: "$"}
  stars={{total: 5, count: 3, average: 4}}
  quantities={[1,2,3,4,5]}
  offerShippingPassEligible={true}
/>

imageUrl.description: The image url of the product

imageSize.description: The size of the item preview image

value.name: number
value.description: The primary price of the product.

currency.name: string
currency.description: The primary currency unit of the product price.

flags.description: Price flags displayed on the image

maxFlags.description: Maximum number of flags to render

price.name: number
price.description: The primary price of the product.

currency.name: string
currency.description: The primary currency unit of the product price.

unitPrice.name: string
unitPrice.description: The price per unit of product.

averageRating.description: The current rating of the product

numberOfReviews.description: The number of reviews for this product

flags.description: Price flags displayed on the image

preorder.description: If this product is avaialble for preorder

isAValidOffer.description:
A flag for if the product isAValidOffer. Generally used for variant combination
    to tell if a product is available for purchase.

offerShippingPassEligible.description: A flag for if the product is shipping pass eligibile.

seoProps.description:
A flag to pass SEO props.
    Should only be called once to avoid duplicate props.

maxTitleLines.description: Maximum number of lines to allow for the product title. 0 for no truncation.

imageSize.description: The size of the item preview image

imageUrl.description: The image url of the product

starsOnClick.description: Function to run when the number of ratings is clicked

pickupable.description: if it can be picked up

pickupToday.description: if it can be picked up today

isWM.description: if the seller is walmart online or store

minDate.description: unix time for the earliest delivery date

maxDate.description: unix time for the latest delivery date

addedQuantity.description: number of items have been added to cart for this ATC click

maxQuantity.description: max quantity available for this item from this seller

maxAddQuantity.description: limit of the number of items which can be added to cart

onQuantityChange.description: quantity select on change event handler

actionStatus.description: action status which controls the ATC button state
